text: Aishwarya Sharma (born 8 December 1992) is an Indian actress. She is best known for her portrayal of Patralekha Salunkhe in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin. == Early life == Aishwarya Sharma was born on 8 December 1992 in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh. She pursued her graduation in Dance from Khairagarh University, Chhattisgarh. Sharma met actor Neil Bhatt on the sets of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin and they announced their engagement in 27 January 2021 and got married on 30 November 2021 in Ujjain. == Filmography == === Television === Year Title Role Ref. 2015 Code Red Sankat Mochan Mahabali Hanumaan Jamwanthi 2015–2016 Suryaputra Karn Urvashi Janbaaz Sindbad Ameen's Mother 2016–2017 Baal Krishna Putana 2017 Meri Durga Amrita Deshmukh 2019 Laal Ishq Saundarya Surajya Sanhita Vishpala 2020–2023 Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin Patralekha Salunkhe 2022 Smart Jodi Contestant Ravivaar With Star Parivaar Patralekha Salunkhe 2023 Fear Factor: Khatron Ke Khiladi 13 Contestant https://www.deccanchronicle.com/entertainment/ott/031023/kkk13-aishwarya- sharma-beats-arjit-taneja-archana-gautam-in-ticket-to.html === Web series === Year Title Role Ref. 2020 Madhuri Talkies Punita === Music videos === Year Title Singer Ref. 2022 Mann Jogiya Yasser Desai == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Indian television actors
